name: Xylem Inc.
description: Xylem Inc. is a leading global water technology company dedicated to solving the world's water challenges. Founded in 2011 and headquartered in Rye Brook, New York, Xylem specializes in innovative water solutions, focusing on the design and application of advanced technologies for water and wastewater treatment, and water management. The company's comprehensive portfolio includes a wide range of products and services that help municipalities and industrial customers optimize water usage, enhance water quality, and reduce environmental impact. Xylem's offerings encompass advanced analytics, smart metering, treatment systems, and pumping solutions, all aimed at addressing the critical issues of water scarcity, pollution, and infrastructure. With a strong commitment to sustainability, Xylem integrates its environmental goals into its business strategy, actively supporting initiatives to conserve water and energy. The company operates in over 150 countries and serves a diverse range of sectors, including municipal, industrial, and agricultural markets. Xylem's mission is to enable customers to manage water responsibly and sustainably, ensuring that this vital resource is available for future generations.
